extension_name.message: Read Aloud: A Text to Speech Voice Reader

extension_description.message: Read out loud the current web-page article with one click. Supports 40+ languages.

options_rate_explain.message: .5 is half speed, 2 is double speed.

uploadpdf_message1.message: {extension_name} cannot access local files stored on your computer.

uploadpdf_message2.message: If you wish, you can use the form below to upload your PDF file to {extension_name} server temporarily for reading. Your file will be removed from the server after you view it.
